name: Shark Wars
description:
Play as Shark X, a NASA experiment sent into space (accidentally), to save the aliens living on Saturnian moons from a threat that comes from afar.

Credits

  • Original shark idea from a GIF I found online and my partner who loves sharks
  • Stereotypical 90's space shooter music by user Jan125, remixed and modified to fit PICO-8 restrictions
  • Thank you to @bridgs and @tarngerine, who gave me feedback on my game before submitting
